title: Snap scoops up Google veteran for senior role
astDescription: Snap Inc. has hired Eric Young for a senior leadership role, reflecting the company’s continued push to strengthen its executive bench with experienced technology leaders.
descriptionText: Snap Inc. has hired Eric Young, a seasoned Google veteran, for a senior leadership role. The move is seen as part of Snap’s broader strategy to reinforce its leadership team and drive innovation across its core product lines.
shortDescription: Snap Inc. has hired Eric Young, a former Google executive, for a senior role as part of its ongoing leadership expansion.
